00 - Before The Workshop

16 June 2015

Prior to the start of the workshop everyone will need to have the software installed and tested. You will need to have R, RStudio, and Git installed. Get the latest versions of each and install using the defaults.

  1. R:
  • General Info
  • Windows
  • Mac
  1. RStudio:
  • General Info
  • Windows
  • Mac
  1. Git:
  • General Info
  • Windows
  • Mac

Once everything is installed, follow the instructions below to test your installation.

Open RStudio

Once installed, RStudio should be accessible from the start menu. Start up RStudio. Once running it should look something like:

Find “Console” window

By default the console window will be on the left side of RStudio. Find that window. It will looking something like:

Copy and paste the code

Click in the window and paste in the code from below:

version$version.string

It should say…

## [1] "R version 3.2.0 (2015-04-16)"

And Check on Git

Lastly, let’s make sure Git is running. Can also do this from R with:

system("git --version")

Which should looking something like…

Workshop Schedule
